Acc = 2c88c77849d64ae9147ddeb88e69c83fc 블록 = 6f7247206863726165736552206d7572 0x01 바이트의 블록 = 016f7247206863726165736552206d7572 Acc + 블록 = 437febea5 05c820f2ad5150db0709f96e (Acc+차단) * r = 21dcc992d0c659ba4036f65bb7f88562ae59b32c2b3b8f7efc8b00f78e548a26 Acc = ((Acc+차단)*r) % P = 2d8adaf23b0337fa7cccf b4ea344b30de
